data.title: Santosh Shukla
data.meta_description: Check out what Santosh Shukla will be attending at PLF2018HYD
data.text:
"Impacting one million INTRAPRENEURS!"

Product Leaders Forum (PLF) is a volunteer-driven non-profit for practitioners, by practitioners, a global movement with chapters in Bangalore, Pune, Hyderabad and Silicon Valley. Our mission is to create an essential and unique platform for Product Leaders. We bring together diverse perspectives & robust dialogue around product thinking; thus enabling mindset change, deep insights, opportunities for hands-on learning for skills augmentation and form networks for peer learning.

Vision and Goal

Create an essential and unique platform for Product Leaders by bringing together diverse perspectives & robust dialog around product thinking thus enabling mindset change, deep insights, opportunities for hands-on learning for skills augmentation and form networks for peer learning.

Our goal is to engage 1 Million Product Leaders across India by 2022 who will help transform India into a digital nation touching the lives of 1.3 Billion people positively.

Value Proposition

Help build a product mindset through forums for passionate cross-channel dialog among practitioners. Gathering and publishing of insights & benchmarks into the changing world of digital transformation. Enhance skill sets through hands-on workshops and other learning methodologies. Provide a product thinking forum for connecting and networking with peers & mentors.

To book your seat visit Ticketing site.
